settings.subtitle: Plus Series
settings.title: Find The Right Window Film For Your Shop
settings.text: Our Plus series of automotive window tint delivers high performance window tint that will outlast and outperform the competition—from our generation 5 carbon window tint to our heat insulating ceramic window tint and even our traditional dyed window tint, we have a window film product that will help you take your business to new heights.

settings.title: Carbon
settings.text: Terraflex allows you to hold the smoking gun against your competitors slinging dyed tint by simply blocking more solar energy and never fading and changing color.

settings.title: Ceramic
settings.text: Built on top of our best-selling carbon film, Panaflex is our best-selling ceramic window tint designed to slow down the heat and stop harmful solar energy.

settings.title: Premium Ceramic
settings.text: Nanoflex adds function to style by keeping the heat and harmful solar energy outside while maintaining a cool and comfortable interior.

settings.title: Carbon HP
settings.text: Terraflex HP is a unique blend of carbon and metallized technology that creates the world's first high performance carbon window tint.

settings.title: Premium Dyed
settings.text: Even though Retroflex is our lowest performing product, it's also surprisingly the longest lasting technology you will find in our industry. Simple should be superior.

settings.title: Style
settings.text: The Plus Series instantly enhances the look of any vehicle it is installed on and is guaranteed to never fade or change color.

settings.title: Protection
settings.text: Blocks over 99.9% of A and B ultraviolet (UV) rays and up to 98% of infrared radiation (IR) from the sun.

settings.title: Heat Insulation
settings.text: The latest in heat insulation technology utilizes non-conductive ceramic to slow down the transfer of heat into the vehicle’s interior, creating a cooler and more comfortable ride.

settings.title: The Types of Automotive Window Tint

settings.subtitle: Generation 5 carbon
settings.title: Terraflex
settings.text: Would you bring a knife to a gunfight? Carbon technology allows you to hold the smoking gun against your competitors slinging dyed film by simply blocking more solar energy and never fading and changing color.

settings.subtitle: Carbon Ceramic
settings.title: Panaflex
settings.text: Built on a carbon chassis, Panaflex is our best selling ceramic window film. The added non-conductive ceramic layer is designed to slow down the heat and boost comfort.

settings.subtitle: Premium Ceramic
settings.title: Nanoflex
settings.text: Like your favorite coffee tumbler, Nanoflex keeps the heat where you want it, outside the vehicle. All while looking stylish and sophisticated.

settings.subtitle: Carbon HP
settings.title: Terraflex HP
settings.text: Terraflex HP is a unique blend of carbon and metallized high performance technology. A vapor coated layer of aluminum amps up our Terraflex to create a high performance product that offers more comfort and protection and is not found anywhere else in the industry.

settings.subtitle: Premium Dyed
settings.title: Retroflex
settings.text: Even though Retroflex is our lowest performing product, it's also surprisingly the longest lasting technology you will find in our industry. Simple should be superior.
